HomePage.heroContent: We provide innovative products that eliminate the complexity in blockchain technology, allowing society to benefit without requiring technical knowledge.
HomePage.heroSubContent: Solvex Network offers the transparency and security benefits of blockchain technology for the benefit of users.
HomePage.whySolvexReply: Solvex Network is a decentralized and community-driven cryptocurrency project built on the BNB Chain Ecosystem. Initially focusing on decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions, the project later transitioned to a community-governed model, aiming to ensure long-term stability through measures such as token burns and liquidity locking. This structure aims to increase the project's credibility and earn the trust of investors and users.
HomePage.servicesSubtitle: Thanks to these technical features, Solvex offers not just a token but a comprehensive ecosystem that protects user data and transactions.
HomePage.tokenSubtitle: Explore the structure where a large portion of the token supply is burned, while the remaining is distributed in a balanced way across marketing, development, liquidity, and circulation use cases.

system.title: Corporate Verification System
system.content: We provide a profile verification system through verified institutions in the connected business and career network.

safe.title: Secure and User-Friendly Wallet
safe.content: A multi-network supported, user-friendly wallet that requires zero technical knowledge.

platform.title: On/Off-Ramp Platform
platform.content: An integrated financial system where you can convert Solvex tokens to TRY and TRY to Solvex tokens.

blockchain.title: Blockchain-Based Smart Contract System
blockchain.content: A Blockchain-based payment and smart contract infrastructure for freelance work in the connected business and career network.

smart.title: Smart Contracts
smart.content: Our smart contracts have been audited by Certik. Please visit the Certik website to view the full report.

decentralized.title: 50 million tokens permanently burned.
decentralized.content: Displays the burn address. Please visit BscScan to view the full report.

HomePage.solvexWalletSubtitle: The most effective way to store your crypto assets with maximum security: offline, immune to attacks, and fully under your control.

whySolvex.title: What is Solvex Wallet?
whySolvex.content: Solvex Wallet is a Web3-based decentralized wallet protected by top-tier security measures. It offers users a secure and user-friendly experience where private keys are completely under their control.

security.title: Full Freedom and Privacy
security.content: Solvex Wallet is designed to ensure full freedom and privacy in the blockchain world. It prioritizes user privacy in every transaction and never shares your data or keys with third parties.

Web3.title: Integrated with the Web3 Ecosystem
Web3.content: With Solvex Wallet, you can securely store and transfer your tokens and easily access dApps in the Web3 world. You can also connect to your favorite protocols with a single touch.

safe.title: Security Comes First
safe.content: Solvex Wallet is equipped with advanced encryption, multi-factor authentication, and hardware security measures to protect user funds. It never compromises on security.

footer.logoSubtitle: Solvex Network is a community-driven cryptocurrency project aiming to make blockchain technology accessible to everyone. It offers secure, transparent, and decentralized solutions.
footer.community: Join us and be part of our community!
footer.contactSubtitle: Our team is always ready to answer your questions. Get in touch with us!
footer.copyright: Solvex Network Â© All Rights Reserved.

AboutPage.h2: What Does Solvex Network Aim for?
AboutPage.subtitle: Solvex Network aims to enable society to benefit from blockchain technology without the need for technical knowledge by offering innovative products that eliminate the complexity of blockchain. With the solutions we develop, we combine user-friendly experiences with high security standards, enabling individuals, institutions, and developers to easily integrate into the blockchain ecosystem.
AboutPage.subtitle2: We are working to build a secure, transparent, and accessible digital economy. We move forward with a vision that aims for everyone to benefit from the advantages of blockchain.

verify.title: Corporate Verification System
verify.content: Profile verification system conducted through approved institutions integrated with the business and career network.

secure.title: Secure and User-Friendly Wallet
secure.content: User-friendly wallet supporting multiple networks with zero technical knowledge required.

onRamp.title: On/Off-Ramp Platform
onRamp.content: An integrated financial system where you can convert Solvex tokens to TRY and vice versa.

smart.title: Smart Contract System
smart.content: Blockchain-based payment and smart contract infrastructure for freelance jobs.

ProductPage.subtitle: Our solutions that make blockchain technology accessible to everyone

card1.title: Digital Card
card1.content: Create fast, effective, and modern communication with QR codes and digital links.

card2.title: Automatic Buy-Sell Bot
card2.content: An automatic crypto buy-sell bot working 24/7 according to the strategies you set.

card3.title: Wallet
card3.content: A secure, easy-to-use wallet system with multi-network support, requiring no technical knowledge.

card1.title: What is Solvex Wallet?
card1.content: Solvex Wallet is a user-friendly wallet that supports different blockchain networks without requiring technical knowledge.

card2.title: Do I need technical knowledge to use the wallet?
card2.content: No, Solvex Wallet is designed to be easy to use for everyone. You can perform transactions without needing technical knowledge.

card3.title: Can I convert Solvex Token to Turkish Lira?
card3.content: Yes. With the developed On/Off-Ramp platform, you can convert Solvex tokens to Turkish Lira and purchase tokens with TL.

card4.title: How does Solvex Network's verification system work?
card4.content: The Corporate Verification System enables user profiles to be verified by approved institutions linked to the business and career network.

card5.title: What is the purpose of the smart contract system?
card5.content: It provides a secure payment and contract infrastructure for freelance work. It offers a transparent and automated process between parties.

card6.title: What is the total supply of Solvex tokens?
card6.content: The total supply is 100 million tokens. 50% of this has been permanently burned. The remaining portion is allocated to various areas.

card7.title: What is on the roadmap for the Solvex platform?
card7.content: The roadmap includes wallet developments, multi-network support, fiat integration, and the business/career network platform.

card9.title: Has part of the token supply been burned?
card9.content: Yes, 50% of the total supply has been permanently burned.
